summary: Cemetery director Robert Kraft discovers that by arbitrarily changing the status of plots from empty to occupied on the planogram causes the death of the plots' owners.
cast: Richard Boone|Theodore Bikel|Peggy Maurer|Howard Smith|Herbert Anderson|Robert Osterloh|Russ Bender|Lynette Bernay|Cyril Delevanti|Ken Drake|Matt Moore|Glen Vernon
title: Entierro a los vivos
